attributes.action: Have COVID vaccination centres operate 24 hours, 7 days a week
attributes.additional_details: There is a significant demand for 24 hour operation of COVID vaccinations.
attributes.background: The UK government seems to think that there is no demand for 24 hour administration of COVID vaccines. This is to correct that misapprehension.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
